casebody.data:
Russell E. PLANITZER and LTP Fund II, L.P., Defendants-Below, Appellants,
v.
MARBEK REVOCABLE TRUST, Harvest Growth Capital LLC, Harvest Growth Capital II LLC, Saturn Partners LP III and SPLP II Opportunity LP, Plaintiffs-Below, Appellees. No. 434, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware.

Submitted: February 6, 2019
Decided: February 11, 2019
Rehearing en Banc Denied February 28, 2019

AFFIRMED.
